thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com
thread.title: Richard Adamo
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Richard Adamo

author: Richard Adamo
title: Richard Adamo
text: Always a pleasure to deal with Eagle Optics today and as I have in the past. I talked with Laura last week and Mike today. The Eagle Optics staff is very friendly and can discuss the details of everything in their inventory. Today I ordered the Swarovski CL Pocket 8x25 binoculars to compliment my Swarovski 8x32 EL's. My 8x25's will be here later this week. Eagle Optics has an excellent return policy which I exercised only once in the past not because of an imperfection in the optic. I exchanged a 10x for an 8x binocular. The folks at Eagle Optics will go out of their way to satisfy.
